"Every Rose Has its Thorn":
"Oh, uh... um... I have a request for you. It's not like
the others I've had. Please, you've got to help me!
I really really need you to go get me
a desert rose from the Lost Sea over on Lilipur. Oh,
and don't ask why. Let's just keep this between you
and me, okay? I know it's extremely rare and valuable,
but I really really need one! Don't let me down!

*Target: Dagans and Kradas level 28 and higher. "

"あー……えーっと……その、だな。
今日はちょっといつもと違うというか
純粋なオレのお願いというか……
頼む！　何も言わず何も聞かずに
惑星リリーパの砂漠で「砂ばらの結晶」を
取ってきてくれないか！？
めっちゃ貴重なモンだってのはわかってる！
どーしても必要なんだ、なっ、頼むよ！

※Lv.28以上のダガン、クラーダが対象"
